Package dmit2015.restclient

Interface TodoItemMpRestClient

@RequestScoped @RegisterRestClient public interface TodoItemMpRestClient
The baseUri for the web MpRestClient be set in either microprofile-config.properties (recommended) or in this file using @RegisterRestClient(baseUri = "http://server/path").

To set the baseUri in microprofile-config.properties: 1) Open src/main/resources/META-INF/microprofile-config.properties 2) Add a key/value pair in the following format: package-name.ClassName/mp-rest/url=baseUri For example: package-name: dmit2015.client ClassName: TodoItemMpRestClient baseUri: http://localhost:8080/contextName The key/value pair you need to add is: dmit2015.client.TodoItemMpRestClient/mp-rest/url=http://localhost:8080/contextName

To use the client interface from an environment does support CDI, add @Inject and @RestClient before the field declaration such as:

  • Method Details

    • create

      @POST @Path("/TodoItem/{userUID}.json") jakarta.json.JsonObject create(@PathParam("userUID") String userId, TodoItem newTodoItem, @QueryParam("auth") String token)

    • findAll

      @GET @Path("/TodoItem/{userUID}.json") LinkedHashMap<String,TodoItem> findAll(@PathParam("userUID") String userId, @QueryParam("auth") String token)

    • findAllByDone

      @GET @Path("/TodoItem/{userUID}.json") LinkedHashMap<String,TodoItem> findAllByDone(@PathParam("userUID") String userId, @QueryParam("auth") String token, @QueryParam("orderBy") String orderBy, @QueryParam("equalTo") boolean done)

    • findById

      @GET @Path("/TodoItem/{userUID}/{key}.json") TodoItem findById(@PathParam("userUID") String userId, @PathParam("key") String id, @QueryParam("auth") String token)

    • update

      @PUT @Path("/TodoItem/{userUID}/{key}.json") TodoItem update(@PathParam("userUID") String userId, @PathParam("key") String key, TodoItem updatedTodoItem, @QueryParam("auth") String token)

    • updateDone

      @PATCH @Path("/TodoItem/{userUID}/{key}.json") jakarta.json.JsonObject updateDone(@PathParam("userUID") String userId, @PathParam("key") String key, jakarta.json.JsonObject payload, @QueryParam("auth") String token)

    • delete

      @DELETE @Path("/TodoItem/{userUID}/{key}.json") void delete(@PathParam("userUID") String userId, @PathParam("key") String key, @QueryParam("auth") String token)
